channel.title: Changing what items do
channel.description: ok... how do you change what an item does? ex. on digitalscape, when you click "read" on a scroll it has edited writing and pictures. please help me do this!!! :confused: PLEASE HELP ME if what i am trying to explain isnt clear please post that! :)
